name: Golden seahorse progressive slotmachine: deep ocean adventure with plenty of treasure!
name_original: Golden seahorse progressive slotmachine: deep ocean adventure with plenty of treasure!
description:

Explore mysterious underwater levels, celeb level, and a special zodiac sign level.all with beautiful HD graphics just like the video slots in Vegas casinos! Play today and enjoy unlimited hours of free entertainment!

• Premium HD graphics and sounds

 • Practice playing slots just like you're in a Las Vegas casino!   

golden seahorse slots is EASY to play and easy to WIN BIG! If you enjoy slots games, then you'll have tons of fun exploring all the hidden secrets of Lost Treasures! Read what others are saying about the game:
